shortcv.p: Vasiliki Vouzi is a graduate of the Department of Management Science and Technology, Athens University of Economic and Business, with a specialization in Information Systems and E-Commerce. She is now attending the MSc in Computer Science at the Department of Informatics in Athens University of Economic and Business.

She has worked at the Management and Financial Department of United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees office in Athens, Greece. From 2004 she works as a research assistant in ISTLab/OIS research group. Her interests lay in the Deployment of tools and Methodologies related to Modeling and Simulation of Complex Systems.
